description: I can't find an example of this anywhere. Is it documented somewhere? If not, could it please be?
title: Provide an example of how to set a ListOpt in nova.conf

comments.content: I can't find an example of this anywhere. Is it documented somewhere? If not, could it please be?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mikal

comments.content:
You might look in the etc/nova/nova.conf.sample in the Nova source tree and grep for ListOpt.

It would be up to distros whether they package this file or not... but the project seems to provide a reasonable sample config file.

Its worth noting the etc/nova/nova.conf.sample can be autogenerated via tools/conf/generate_sample.sh.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince
